Having sat down and finally plowed thru this I have to agree with the last
posting the Ninja-to comes from theatre. If there were cheap and mass produced
they would still be seen som/ewhere in Japan. Outside of "Ninja" museums I have
yet to encounter one.
    I am very much intrigued by the scholarly tone of many of these posts.
Anyone know of Japanese sources for any of this info?

Tom
